Chapter Next

gstReadVRMLFile

gstSeparator* gstReadVRMLFile( const char* filename ) ;

Read a VRML 2 file and convert into a GHOST scene graph. Given the name of a file in the VRML 2.0 format, this function returns a gstSeparator containing the VRML scene graph in the GHOST v2 format.

Declared in header file: gstVRML.h
